name: GMTK2020 - BOUNCESTRONAUT
description:
Greetings!

We are a team of 3 people joining the jam for the first time.

We couldn't really put any instructions into the game so please read this:

BLUE ZONE - Disables turning

RED ZONE - Disables thrust

GREEN ZONE - Disables shooting

Controls:

Turn: A , D or Left, Right arrows

Thrust: Spacebar

Shoot: Left mouse or Right Alt

-- KNOWN BUGS --

Bounce counter seems to be broken :(

All art was made by us except for sound effects.

Sound effects from free Sonnis audio package.

Thank you, to anyone that tries it!

R.Z. J.T. L.T.
